text: The Group A of the 2015 Copa América was one of the three groups of competing nations in the 2015 Copa América. It consisted of Chile (hosts), Mexico (invited team), Ecuador, and Bolivia. Group play began on 11 June 2015 and ended on 19 June 2015. Chile and Bolivia advanced to the quarter-finals. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:left;" |- !rowspan=2| Draw position !rowspan=2| Team !rowspan=2| Appearance !rowspan=2| Previous best performance !colspan=2| FIFA Rankings |- !
